data.what_is:
Retainly is built to ensure that more of your customers come back to your business, time and again. 
It's easy to learn and work with, which means you can execute impactful campaigns without the hassle. 
With Retainly, you can keep your customers engaged and build stronger, longer-lasting relationships.
data.product_description:
Retainly is the automated engagement platform that helps businesses maximize customer retention.  

 Our all-in-one app enables you to automate emails, web push notifications and SMS messages to retain customers and drive lifetime value.        
 

 Retention & LTV:  
 

 Increasingly business leaders are expecting marketing and product teams to play a key role in growth - and customer retention is the critical platform on which growth is built. Retainly helps you send targeted and automated communications to help you integrate customer comms workflows; launch new offers; promote discounts; cross-sell products and services; increase loyalty and improve retention.       
 

 Ease-of-use:  
 

 The vast majority of marketers only use 10-15% of their available marketing tech stack, because it is too complex to work with - often requiring the support of their IT department. Retainly has been built with ease of use in mind. It's easy to learn and work with, which means you can execute impactful campaigns without the hassle. 
 

 Save time:      
 

 Product and marketing teams are stretched and increasingly asked to do more with less. Often campaigns take too long to get to market because of fragmented tools and overly complex features. Retainly has just what you need to run campaigns quickly. It easily integrates with your CRM and other tools and requires less manual set-up and maintenance.  
 

 

 All-in-one:  
 

 Many businesses are using different platforms that aren't integrated. This results in cumbersome, manual processes and data siloes. It also means you need to learn how to use many disparate tools. Retainly is an all-in-one engagement platform with drip marketing functionality, which allows you to engage with customers across multiple channels. You work with a single set of customer data - to segment, analyze and report on.
